headline: Citi Names New CFO and Reorganizes Units in Surprise Moves
summary: Gonzalo Luchetti, the bank’s head of U.S. personal banking, will take on the finance chief role in early March from Mark Mason, who has held the role for the past seven years.

raw.headline: Citi Names New CFO and Reorganizes Units in Surprise Moves
raw.summary: Gonzalo Luchetti, the bank’s head of U.S. personal banking, will take on the finance chief role in early March from Mark Mason, who has held the role for the past seven years.

headline: Citigroup Names New CFO and Reorganizes Personal-Banking Business
summary: Citigroup  named a new chief financial officer and shuffled other executive roles as part of a reorganization of its personal-banking business.  Gonzalo Luchetti,  the bank’s head of U.S. personal banking, will take over as CFO in March, Citigroup said Thursday.  At that time, the current CFO,  Mark Mason,  will become an executive vice chair and senior executive adviser to Chief Executive Officer  Jane Fraser.

raw.headline: Citigroup Names New CFO and Reorganizes Personal-Banking Business
raw.summary: Citigroup  named a new chief financial officer and shuffled other executive roles as part of a reorganization of its personal-banking business.  Gonzalo Luchetti,  the bank’s head of U.S. personal banking, will take over as CFO in March, Citigroup said Thursday.  At that time, the current CFO,  Mark Mason,  will become an executive vice chair and senior executive adviser to Chief Executive Officer  Jane Fraser.

headline: Looking at the Narrative for Maersk After Shifting Analyst Outlooks and Updated Price Targets
summary: Recent updates to the consensus price target for A.P. Møller Mærsk have captured the attention of investors, as new analyst reports reflect a shift from DKK 11,925 to DKK 11,992. This adjustment comes amid a combination of optimism around the company’s operational performance and ongoing caution about the broader market environment. Stay tuned to discover how investors can follow these developing perspectives and better navigate the evolving narrative around A.P. Møller Mærsk’s stock. Analyst...

headline: U.S. Banks Shelve $20 Billion Bailout Plan for Argentina
summary: Bankers are instead discussing a smaller, short-term facility to help Argentina make a roughly $4 billion debt payment in January.

raw.headline: U.S. Banks Shelve $20 Billion Bailout Plan for Argentina
raw.summary: Bankers are instead discussing a smaller, short-term facility to help Argentina make a roughly $4 billion debt payment in January.

headline: Citi Announces CFO Transition Plans and Changes to U.S. Personal Banking Business
summary: NEW YORK, November 20, 2025--Citi announced today that it will begin the process of transitioning the role of Chief Financial Officer from Mark Mason to Gonzalo Luchetti.

raw.headline: Citi Announces CFO Transition Plans and Changes to U.S. Personal Banking Business
raw.summary: NEW YORK, November 20, 2025--Citi announced today that it will begin the process of transitioning the role of Chief Financial Officer from Mark Mason to Gonzalo Luchetti.

headline: Citigroup (C) Surged as Its Restructuring and Turnaround Plan Surpassed Expectations
summary: Cullen Capital Management, LLC, operating under the name Schafer Cullen Capital Management, Inc. (SCCM), has released its “SCCM Value Equity Strategy” third-quarter investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The US equity market continued the rally in the third quarter, with the S&P 500 returning 8.1% and the Russell 1000 Value surging 5.3%. […]
